channel.title: Cedar Breaks Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Cedar Breaks Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End UT-148 South at UT-14
item.description: End UT-148 south at UT-14. Turn right on UT-14 for Cedar City and I-15. Turn left on UT-14 for US-89. UT-14 is part of the Markagunt High Plateau Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-143 West at UT-148
item.description: UT-143 west at UT-148. Turn right to continue west on UT-143 (Utahâ€™s Patchwork Parkway National Scenic Byway). Turn left for UT-148 (Cedar Breaks Scenic Byway).
